item.title: americans hold dim view of u.s. economic outlook: poll
item.description: americans are more pessimistic about the u.s. economic outlook than they have been since the start of the obama administration and most believe the united states is on the wrong track, according to a new york times/cbs news poll released on thursday.

item.title: the americas: chile: inquiry ordered in poet's death

item.title: bus in bronx crash was speeding just before accident
item.description: the discount tour bus that crashed in the bronx last month, killing 15 people, was traveling at its maximum speed of 78 miles per hours just before it slammed into a highway sign pole, said a federal report released on friday.
